2 #include "ssmt/Turbine.h"

4 Turbine::Turbine(Solve solveFor, double inletPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity inletQuantity,
5  double inletQuantityValue, TurbineProperty turbineProperty, double isentropicEfficiency,
6  double generatorEfficiency, double massFlowOrPowerOut, double outletSteamPressure)
7  : solveFor(solveFor), inletPressure(inletPressure), isentropicEfficiency(isentropicEfficiency / 100),
8  generatorEfficiency(generatorEfficiency / 100), massFlowOrPowerOut(massFlowOrPowerOut),
9  outletSteamPressure(outletSteamPressure), inletQuantity(inletQuantity),
10  inletQuantityValue(inletQuantityValue), turbineProperty(turbineProperty)
11 {
12  if (solveFor == Solve::IsentropicEfficiency) {
13  throw std::runtime_error("Must use the other Turbine constructor to solve for Isentropic Efficiency");
14  }
15  calculate();
16 }
17 
18 Turbine::Turbine(const Solve solveFor, const double inletPressure,
19  const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity inletQuantity, const double inletQuantityValue,
20  const TurbineProperty turbineProperty, const double generatorEfficiency,
21  const double massFlowOrPowerOut, const double outletSteamPressure,
22  const SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity outletQuantity, const double outletQuantityValue)
23  : solveFor(solveFor), inletPressure(inletPressure), generatorEfficiency(generatorEfficiency / 100),
24  massFlowOrPowerOut(massFlowOrPowerOut), outletSteamPressure(outletSteamPressure),
25  inletQuantity(inletQuantity), outletQuantity(outletQuantity), inletQuantityValue(inletQuantityValue),
26  outletQuantityValue(outletQuantityValue), turbineProperty(turbineProperty)
27 {
28  if (solveFor == Solve::OutletProperties) {
29  throw std::runtime_error("Must use the other Turbine constructor to solve for Outlet Properties");
30  }
31  calculate();
32 }
33 
34 void Turbine::calculate() {
35  if (solveFor == Solve::OutletProperties) {
36  solveForOutletProperties();
37  } else {
38  solveForIsentropicEfficiency();
39  }
40 }
41 
42 void Turbine::solveForOutletProperties() {
43  inletProperties = SteamProperties(inletPressure, inletQuantity, inletQuantityValue).calculate();
44  auto const inletSpecificEnthalpy = inletProperties.specificEnthalpy;
45 
46  outletProperties = SteamProperties(outletSteamPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTROPY,
47  inletProperties.specificEntropy).calculate();
48  auto const idealOutletSpecificEnthalpy = outletProperties.specificEnthalpy;
49 
50  auto const outletSpecificEnthalpy = inletSpecificEnthalpy
51  - isentropicEfficiency * (inletSpecificEnthalpy - idealOutletSpecificEnthalpy);
52 
53  outletProperties = SteamProperties(outletSteamPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTHALPY,
54  outletSpecificEnthalpy).calculate();
55 
56  calculateTurbineProperties(inletSpecificEnthalpy, outletSpecificEnthalpy);
57 }
58 
59 void Turbine::solveForIsentropicEfficiency() {
60  inletProperties = SteamProperties(inletPressure, inletQuantity, inletQuantityValue).calculate();
61  auto const inletSpecificEnthalpy = inletProperties.specificEnthalpy;
62 
63  outletProperties = SteamProperties(outletSteamPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTROPY,
64  inletProperties.specificEntropy).calculate();
65  auto const idealOutletSpecificEnthalpy = outletProperties.specificEnthalpy;
66 
67  outletProperties = SteamProperties(outletSteamPressure, SteamProperties::ThermodynamicQuantity::TEMPERATURE,
68  outletQuantityValue).calculate();
69 
70  isentropicEfficiency = (inletSpecificEnthalpy - outletProperties.specificEnthalpy)
71  / (inletSpecificEnthalpy - idealOutletSpecificEnthalpy);
72 
73  calculateTurbineProperties(inletSpecificEnthalpy, outletProperties.specificEnthalpy);
74 }
75 
76 void Turbine::calculateTurbineProperties(const double inletSpecificEnthalpy, const double outletSpecificEnthalpy) {
77  if (turbineProperty == TurbineProperty::PowerOut) {
78  energyOut = massFlowOrPowerOut / generatorEfficiency;
79  massFlow = energyOut / (inletSpecificEnthalpy - outletSpecificEnthalpy);
80  powerOut = massFlowOrPowerOut;
81  } else {
82  massFlow = massFlowOrPowerOut;
83  energyOut = (inletSpecificEnthalpy - outletSpecificEnthalpy) * massFlow;
84  powerOut = energyOut * generatorEfficiency;
85  }
86 
87  inletEnergyFlow = inletSpecificEnthalpy * massFlow;
88  outletEnergyFlow = outletSpecificEnthalpy * massFlow;
89 }
90 
91 void Turbine::setSolveFor(Turbine::Solve solveFor) {
92  this->solveFor = solveFor;
93  calculate();
94 }

97  this->inletPressure = inletPressure;
98  calculate();
99 }

101 void Turbine::setIsentropicEfficiency(double isentropicEfficiency) {
102  this->isentropicEfficiency = isentropicEfficiency / 100;
103  calculate();
104 }

109 }
